thread.title: Wade Duke recorded a hole-in-one on a par 4 and the University of Mobile men's golf team finished second
thread.title_full: Wade Duke recorded a hole-in-one on a par 4 and the University of Mobile men's golf team finished second | AL.com

author: UMobile Athletics
title: Wade Duke recorded a hole-in-one on a par 4 and the University of Mobile men's golf team finished second
text:
The University of Mobile's Wade Duke recorded a hole-in-one on the Par-4 hole No. 13 at the Spring Hill Golf Course Monday as the Rams finished second at the Badger Shootout.
Duke finished at even-par 144 (75, 69), missing out on top honors by only one stroke. His hole-in-one helped him to a final round 69, the best score of any round.
"I hit my shot and executed it pretty well and landed it on top of the pin," Duke said. "Assistant coach Zach Day was standing behind the green practicing a swing so I thought I overshot the green. I was all worked up thinking I wasn't even close, and then he met me halfway on the green and said 'congrats on your hole-in-one.' It was pretty insane. You kind of live for those moments. It was pretty awesome."
Individuals
2 – Wade Duke E 144 (75, 69)
T8 – Connor Hogan +9 153 (81, 72)
T12 – Mike Herperger +12 156 (80, 76)
T12 – Declan Illingsworth +12 156 (79, 77)
15 – Cole Ranson +13 157 (76, 81)
T18 – Keith Brooks +16 160 (77, 83)
T40 – T.J. Smith +34 178 (86, 92)
42 – Jon Michael Davidson +42 186 (96, 90)
Team Standings
1 – Spring Hill +4 580 (293, 287)
2 – Mobile +34 610 (312, 298)
3 – Loyola +61 637 (320, 317)
4 – Faulkner State +66 642 (317, 325)
5 – Emory +109 685 (345, 340)
Quotable
Head Coach T.J. Jackson: "We put ourselves in a bit of a hole yesterday, so it's nice to bounce back like we did today. Wade and Connor shot really well. We just need a couple more like that and we shoot under par as a team. We finished on a high note and just need to keep it going."
What's Next?
Mobile will compete in the Faulkner University Tournament Oct. 19-20 in Montgomery, Ala.
